SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD.CREATE_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, BOARD.DELETE_FL, BOARD.MEMBER_NO, COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR("COMMENT".CREATE_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') CREATE_DT, "COMMENT".DELETE_FL, MEMBER.MEMBER_NO, "COMMENT".BOARD_NO FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" ON (BOARD.BOARD_NO = "COMMENT".BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON (MEMBER.MEMBER_NO = BOARD.MEMBER_NO)
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?)
